description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. XCross is the first picross for 360!  - More than 100 picross  - Unlockable and trophy room - Experimental 3D picross.  - ArkX Lite!  Hours of fun ahead!
